Description.message: Corrects translation errors in programming docs by replacing code tags with span tags, enhancing readability.

ExcludeTagsDescription.message: Select parent tags where code elements will not be converted

LanguageControlDescription.message: When enabled, the extension will only apply modifications if the page's language differs from your browser's language.

SkipStyledCodeDescription.message: Skip conversion for code tags with specific styles

TranslateNoDescription.message: Automatically add a "no translate" attribute to <pre> tags to prevent translation of code blocks.

ExcludeDomainsDescription.message: Add domains to exclude from this extension's processing. Recommended for sites that generate code tags automatically, ex. generative-AI sites.

ResetConfirmMessage.message: Are you sure you want to reset settings? This will not affect the excluded domains.

ReloadWarning.message: âš  You need to reload each tab to apply the changes after modifying the settings.
